                            <span title="">Business</span><h1 title="">Business</h1>
</div>   
            
            
	
	<div id="inpagenav">
        <h5>Business Partners</h5>
		<a class="connectlogo" href="https://connect.ncdot.gov/"><span>Connect NCDOT</span></a>
		
		
		<p class="connectp indent">
			Our new site for online collaboration and resources for NCDOT business partners.
		</p>
		
		<h5>Important Links</h5>

         <!--strong class="block">NC Smartlink Request for Proposals</strong>
        <ul>
            <li class="pdf"><a href="Smartlink/SmartlinkRFP.pdf">RFP Documents and Reference Material</a></li>
     
     		</ul-->
        <span class="block">DOT Ethics Policy &amp; the Holidays</span>
        <ul>
            <li class="pdf"><a href="/download/business/business_ethicsvendors_20101123.pdf">Gifts from Vendors</a></li>
            <li class="pdf"><a href="/download/business/business_ethicsdmv_20101124.pdf">Gifts from Users of NCDOT &amp; NCDMV Services</a></li>
     		</ul>
     </div>
    
    <img src="/_graphics/site_graphics/business_peopletryptic.jpg" alt="Business People" />
	

		<p>The N.C. Department of Transportation conducts business with hundreds of vendors and contractors every year.  With their help, we’re able to connect people and places in North Carolina.</p>    
        

    <h2><a href="#" id="information">NCDOT Business Information</a></h2>
   
    
        <h4><a href="howtogetstarted/">How to Get Started</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">Never worked with the department before?  This brief guide will explain each of the steps your business must take before bidding on a project.</p>

        <h4><a href="whatsnext/">What's Next</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">Your business has met its prequalification requirements and is now ready to bid on projects.  This section will show you how to take part in that process.</p>

         <h4><a class="pdf" href="/download/business/businessFAQ.pdf">Questions?</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">Visit our Frequently Asked Questions section to help make the process easier.</p>
      

    <h2 class="topmarginmore"><a href="#" id="resources">Additional Resources</a></h2>
        <h3>Highway Letting / Advertisements</h3>
        
          

          
          <h4><a href="/doh/preconstruct/altern/design_build/">Design Build</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">The Design Build group administers the Department's Design Build Program and, in concert with the Design Build Executive Committee, is authorized to contract up to 25 design build projects annually.</p>
    
    <h4><a target="_blank" href="https://www.ips.state.nc.us/IPS/BidList.aspx?x=3%2bl%2fX3b%2bZ6HYVoph%2fc173ZPuGcG9LdD2WLJbQep%2b3%2fIBCgGvSWtdXGi55zCMSwBOoHcY2CO5NfkWtPeQhsO9QQ%3d%3d">Interactive Purchasing System</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">View and bid on contracts available for commodities and services, including construction and maintenance of facilities (vertical construction).</p>
    
          <h4><a href="/doh/preconstruct/highway/roadway/eng_coord/pd/current.html">Professional Services: Current Advertisements</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">NCDOT advertisements for professional and / or specialized services.</p>
            
            
            <h4><a href="/doh/preconstruct/ps/contracts/letting.html">Project Letting</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">This section offers links to project advertisements and letting lists.</p>
            
            <h4><a href="/business/letting/bridge/">Bridge &amp; Culvert Letting</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">This section offers information &amp; documents to project letting lists.</p>
            
            <h4><a href="/business/rowsurplusproperty/">Right of Way Surplus Property</a></h4>
            <p class="indenth5">This section offers information &amp; and a current location map of available property for sale by sealed bid.</p>


        <h3>New Product Information</h3>
        
            <h4><a href="https://apps.dot.state.nc.us/vendor/approvedproducts/">Approved Product List</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">This section provides information about the NCDOT Approved Products, Seed, Producers/Suppliers, Technician Certifications, and the Minimum Sampling Guide that are used in the different stages of highway construction.</p>

            <h4><a href="/doh/preconstruct/altern/value/newprod/">Evaluation Process</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">This program involves the approval of construction products used in the building of NCDOT highways and bridges.</p>

            <h4><a href="https://apps.dot.state.nc.us/vendor/approvedproducts/MinimumSamplingGuide.aspx">Minimum Sampling Guide</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">This section provides information about the various NCDOT material types used in the different stages of highway construction.</p>

        <h3>Business Programs Management</h3>
    
            <h4><a href="/business/ocr/">Business Opportunity and Workforce Development</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">NCDOT is committed to advancing North Carolina's economy by ensuring that ALL businesses have an equal opportunity to succeed. Our focus is on businesses that have been historically underutilized: minority, women and disabled-owned businesses. Increased participation by these businesses strengthens communities across the state.</p>
    
            <h4><a href="/business/ocs/">Contractual Services</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">The Contractual Services Unit's mission is to provide optimal service to the contracting community as they conduct business with the NCDOT and other partners throughout the state.</p>

            <!--
            <h4><a class="pdf" href="/download/business/business_disadvantaged.pdf">Disadvantaged Businesses</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">NCDOT sponsors many programs and services designed to help pave the way for DBE success. They are offered to certified DBEs and funded by the Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) to support the DBE Supportive Services program under the provisions of 49 Code of Federal Regulations Part 26.</p>
             
            <h4><a href="/financial/purchasing/">Purchasing Section</a></h4>
                <p class="indenth5">The purchasing section of the department of transportation reports to the chief financial officer and has the authority and responsibility of obtaining all commodities necessary for the operation and maintenance of the Department of Transportation.</p>
            -->
            
        <!--h3>DOT Ethics Policy and the Holidays</h3>
        
        		<h4><a class="pdf" href="/download/business/business_ethicsvendors_20101123.pdf">Gifts from Vendors</a></h4>
            		<p class="indenth5">Memorandum from Secretary Gene Conti to Contractors, Consultants and Vendors.</p>
            
            <h4><a class="pdf" href="/download/business/business_ethicsdmv_20101124.pdf">Gifts from Users of NCDOT and NCDMV Services</a></h4>
            		<p class="indenth5">Memorandum from Secretary Gene Conti to users of NCDOT and NCDMV Services.</p-->
